entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who gasped and asked excitedly about the silver doe. He is also described as hungry and eating bread with Aberforth.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as the one who brought food for Ron and Harry. He is also described as having a Patronus that is a goat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as sitting slumped in his chair with Ron after eating.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned by Aberforth as a group that someone with 'brains like that' could be part of.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: Patronus is mentioned as a magical protection that can take the form of an animal. Both Ron and Aberforth have Patronuses.

entities.name: silver doe
entities.description: The silver doe is mentioned by Ron as a Patronus that was sent to them.

entities.name: goat
entities.description: Aberforth's Patronus takes the form of a goat.

relationships.description: Ron is excited about the silver doe being a Patronus sent to them.
Aberforth's Patronus takes the form of a goat.
